DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate impact serum progesterone concentration day embryo transfer egg donation cycle hormonal replacement therapy . As secondary outcome , investigator investigate endometrial volume measure three-dimensional ( 3D ) ultrasound day embryo transfer related progesterone level chance pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Value Mid-luteal Serum Progesterone Levels Egg Donation Cycles
DOC.criteria: Age < 50 yo BMI < 30Kg/m2 Hormonal replacement cycle Endometrial thickness > 6.5 mm proliferative phase Transfer one two blastocyst grade AB accord ASEBIR Uterine pathology Cryptozoospermia Severe implantation failure ( > 6 GQ embryo transfer without success )
